name: This Drone of Mine
description:
MADE WITH UNREAL ENGINE 4

STORY:

In the distant future, nuclear waste sites located everywhere in the deep space is one of the greatest dangers to humankind. You work for a company that locates and marks waste sites to prepare them for extraction. Today looks like any other day at your job, but is it, really?

HOW TO PLAY:

Left thumbstick/WSAD - movement

Right thumbstick/arrows - looking around

Primary gamepad button [A]/Space - leave marker

Triggers/Z/M - rotating light

Secondary gamepad button [Y] - complete extraction
